article_title: Southern Baptists urge Obama to defend ‘the least of these’ against ISIS
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) “The world will applaud your courage and compassion as you defend those that Scripture calls 'the least of these,'" they wrote.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Christian, Evangelical, ISIS, islam, Islamic State, President Barack Obama, Ronnie Floyd, Southern Baptist Convention
